item.title: JAXA and Ricoh release 360-degree spherical pictures and videos captured in outer space
item.description: [Ricoh Global Official Website] Ricoh Company, Ltd., today announced that the 360-degree spherical camera jointly developed with The Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency successfully captured 360-degree spherical pictures and videos in outer space.

item.title: Ricoh commits to tackling inequality by joining Business for Inclusive Growth coalition
item.description: [Ricoh Global Official Website] Ricoh Company, Ltd., today announced that it has joined a group of international companies who have pledged to tackle inequality and promote diversity in their workplaces and supply chains.

item.title: 【RICOH Industrial Solutions】 Launch of New RICOH FL-CC3524-5MX Five Megapixel 35mm Focal Length FA Lens
item.description: [Ricoh Global Official Website] On August 29, RICOH Industrial Solutions Inc. is launching a new 35mm 5MX lens to expand the line-up of the three existing 2/3" 12, 16 and 25mm 5MX lenses for 5 megapixel cameras released in October 2018.

item.title: JAXA and Ricoh jointly develop a compact spherical camera for use in outer space
item.description: [Ricoh Global Official Website] The Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency and Ricoh Company, Ltd., today announced that they have jointly developed a spherical camera that can be used in outer space (outside the spacecraft) to capture 360-degree spherical images in a single shot.
